title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Sen. Tom Cotton | 4/10/20
description:
It’s Good Friday, America! Glenn shares the best news he could find. Bill O’Reilly gives his big story of the week: The far Left is using the pandemic to destroy the American system through panic and socialist solutions. A surprising number of people seem willing to pick the virus over another Trump term. And Bill finally watched “Tiger King” and has a less-than-stellar review. And Sen. Tom Cotton, who “saw the coronavirus coming,” joins to describe what he sees now.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
